result.eng: I payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ga: dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.orig: dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seo
result.html: dhíol mé leathmhíle euro as an rothar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.
result.ponchtml: ḋíol mé leaṫṁíle euro as an roṫar seoI payed a half a thousand euro for this bicycle.

result.html: tháinig mé ar an rotharI came on the bicycle.
